contentList.content: Spend a Level [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to replenish a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration Charge</LSTag>.
Spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> to replenish a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration Charge</LSTag>.
This has mostly been added to see if this works around the weird bug.
